short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supports markdown text previews and descriptions in GUS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Salesforce Internal Use Only. Supports both Lightning and Classic versions. Uses https://github.com/chjj/marked markdown interpreter in most cases.
Special cases: 4 surrounding asterisks or underscores for <strong>, 3 surrounding asterisks or underscores for <em>, words at the beginning of a line preceding a semicolon are automatically bolded.
Github repository: https://github.com/jwilcurt-salesforce-com/gus-markdown
